message.name: ERR_ENT_ACTION_XFV_MOTE_THAN_ONE_OWNER
message.locale: Only one Owner must be specified.

message.name: ERR_ENT_ACTION_RV_CANCELLED_MODIFY
message.locale: Action cannot be modified as it has been canceled.
Action cannot be modified as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ENT_ACTION_XRV_ACTIONPLAN_ENDED
message.locale: This action cannot be added to the action plan as the action plan has ended.

message.name: ERR_ENT_ACTION_XRV_ACTIONPLAN_CANCELLED
message.locale: This action cannot be added to the action plan as the action plan is canceled.
This action cannot be added to the action plan as the action plan is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ACTION_ACTUAL_END_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_AFTER_ACTIONPLAN_ACTUAL_END_DATE
message.locale: The Actual End Date, %1s, of an Action must be on or before the Actual End Date, %2s, of an Action Plan.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SITUATIONREQUIRINGACTION_EMPTY
message.locale: Situation Requiring Action must be specified.
